short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GitHub: makes the "Comment" buttons the first in tab order

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This makes the "Comment" buttons first in the GitHub pull request tab order, by hiding the "Attach files" and "Styling with Markdown" links from the tab order.

Source code is at https://github.com/kalman/chrome-extensions/tree/master/github-pr-tab.
